mapper.select: select T.CANDIDATE_ID, R.ITEM_ID, R.START_TIME, R.END_TIME, R.SOLD_QUALITY, R.PRICE, R.SHIPPING_TYPE, R.SHIPPING_FEE, R.SELLING_PER_DAY, R.SELLING_DAYS, R.NAME, R.URL, R.SELLER_ID, R.IMAGE_URL, R.CURRENCY_ID, R.SITE_ID, R.BID_COUNT, R.COUNTRY, R.CATEGORY_ID, R.CATEGORY_NAME, R.LOCATION, R.TIME_LEFT, R.SKU, R.LISTING_TYPE from EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM_REF T,EB_ITEM R WHERE T.ITEM_ID=R.ITEM_ID

select T.CANDIDATE_ID, R.ITEM_ID, R.START_TIME, R.END_TIME, R.SOLD_QUALITY, R.PRICE, R.SHIPPING_TYPE, R.SHIPPING_FEE, R.SELLING_PER_DAY, R.SELLING_DAYS, R.NAME, R.URL, R.SELLER_ID, R.IMAGE_URL, R.CURRENCY_ID, R.SITE_ID, R.BID_COUNT, R.COUNTRY, R.CATEGORY_ID, R.CATEGORY_NAME, R.LOCATION, R.TIME_LEFT, R.SKU, R.LISTING_TYPE from EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM_REF T,EB_ITEM R WHERE T.ITEM_ID=R.ITEM_ID
mapper.insert: insert into EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM_REF (CANDIDATE_ID, ITEM_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, SOLD_QUALITY, PRICE, SHIPPING_TYPE, SHIPPING_FEE, SELLING_PER_DAY, SELLING_DAYS, NAME, URL, SELLER_ID, IMAGE_URL, CURRENCY_ID, SITE_ID, BID_COUNT, COUNTRY, CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, LOCATION, TIME_LEFT, SKU, LISTING_TYPE) values (#{candidateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebItem.itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebItem.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ebItem.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #ebItem.soldQuality:DECIMAL#, #ebItem.price:DECIMAL#, #{ebItem.shippingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #ebItem.shippingFee:DECIMAL#, #ebItem.sellingPerDay:DECIMAL#, #ebItem.sellingDays:DECIMAL#, #{ebItem.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebItem.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebItem.sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebItem.imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebItem.currencyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebItem.siteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #ebItem.bidCount:DECIMAL#, #{ebItem.country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebItem.categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebItem.categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebItem.location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebItem.timeLeft,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebItem.sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebItem.listingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM_REF set CANDIDATE_ID = #{record.candidateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_ID = #{record.ebItem.itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME = #{record.ebItem.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{record.ebItem.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SOLD_QUALITY = #record.ebItem.soldQuality:DECIMAL#, PRICE = #record.ebItem.price:DECIMAL#, SHIPPING_TYPE = #{record.ebItem.shippingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIPPING_FEE = #record.ebItem.shippingFee:DECIMAL#, SELLING_PER_DAY = #record.ebItem.sellingPerDay:DECIMAL#, SELLING_DAYS = #record.ebItem.sellingDays:DECIMAL#, NAME = #{record.ebItem.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{record.ebItem.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELLER_ID = #{record.ebItem.sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMAGE_URL = #{record.ebItem.imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENCY_ID = #{record.ebItem.currencyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SITE_ID = #{record.ebItem.siteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BID_COUNT = #record.ebItem.bidCount:DECIMAL#, COUNTRY = #{record.ebItem.country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY_ID = #{record.ebItem.categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY_NAME = #{record.ebItem.categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCATION = #{record.ebItem.location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIME_LEFT = #{record.ebItem.timeLeft,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKU = #{record.ebItem.sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LISTING_TYPE = #{record.ebItem.listingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
